query:
CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS `quality_trend_report_configs` (
	`id` int AUTO_INCREMENT NOT NULL PRIMARY KEY,
	`user_id` int NOT NULL,
	`name` varchar(255) NOT NULL,
	`description` text,
	`production_line_ids` json,
	`workstation_ids` json,
	`product_codes` json,
	`period_type` enum('daily','weekly','monthly','quarterly','yearly') DEFAULT 'weekly',
	`comparison_periods` int DEFAULT 4,
	`include_cpk` int NOT NULL DEFAULT 1,
	`include_ppk` int NOT NULL DEFAULT 1,
	`include_defect_rate` int NOT NULL DEFAULT 1,
	`include_violation_count` int NOT NULL DEFAULT 1,
	`include_quality_score` int NOT NULL DEFAULT 1,
	`enable_line_chart` int NOT NULL DEFAULT 1,
	`enable_bar_chart` int NOT NULL DEFAULT 1,
	`enable_pie_chart` int NOT NULL DEFAULT 1,
	`enable_heatmap` int NOT NULL DEFAULT 0,
	`schedule_enabled` int NOT NULL DEFAULT 0,
	`schedule_frequency` enum('daily','weekly','monthly'),
	`schedule_time` varchar(5),
	`schedule_day_of_week` int,
	`schedule_day_of_month` int,
	`email_recipients` json,
	`webhook_config_ids` json,
	`is_active` int NOT NULL DEFAULT 1,
	`last_generated_at` timestamp NULL,
	`created_at` timestamp NOT NULL DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP,
	`updated_at` timestamp NOT NULL DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP ON UPDATE CURRENT_TIMESTAMP
);

CREATE INDEX IF NOT EXISTS `idx_trend_report_user` ON `quality_trend_report_configs` (`user_id`);
CREATE INDEX IF NOT EXISTS `idx_trend_report_active` ON `quality_trend_report_configs` (`is_active`);
